author: hawkeye
msg: Changed Monitor so it has a better closing pattern. It now waits until it has finished receiving the
output from the server before closing down - even when told to do so. this may
cause problems when it *really* should stop but we'll see !

author: hawkeye
msg: Changed so the starting of the monitor is not forked and therefore there is no
need to wait for it when running a test.

author: hawkeye
msg: fixed call to "rc" on windows because using <arg line="..."> doesn't work if the
path has a space in it
